sentences.en: a boat trip around the islands
After prepping the boat, they sailed it down to Carloforte.
sentences.cn: 备好船后，他们就驶向了南边的卡洛福泰。

sentences.en: Blake jumped in expertly; the boat dipped slightly under his weight.
sentences.cn: 布莱克很熟练地跳上了船，他的重量使小船微微向下沉了沉。

sentences.en: Driving a boat is not the same as driving a car.
sentences.cn: 驾船和开车不是一回事。

sentences.en: Goldring booked a berth on the first boat he could.
sentences.cn: 戈德林订了他能订到的最早一班船的铺位。

sentences.en: He flashed his light into the boat and saw the fishing-line.
sentences.cn: 他朝船上照去，看见了钓鱼线。

sentences.en: I had to stock the boat up with food.
It would be just his luck to miss the last boat.
sentences.cn: 他就这运气，误了最后一班船也毫不出奇。

sentences.en: The boat capsized (=  turned over  ) in heavy seas.
sentences.cn: 船在波涛汹涌的大海上倾覆了。

sentences.en: The boat started to spin around in the water.
The boat was anchored off the northern coast of the peninsula.
sentences.cn: 这艘船停泊在离该半岛北部海岸不远的地方。

sentences.en: The boat's engine misfired after he tried to start it up.
sentences.cn: 他试着启动船的引擎，但没发动起来。

sentences.en: The island may be reached by boat from the mainland.
sentences.cn: 这个岛屿可以从大陆乘小船到达。

sentences.en: The path serves as an approach to the boat house.
This boat has a good deck layout making everything easy to operate.
sentences.cn: 这艘船的甲板布局合理，使得所有操控都很方便。

sentences.en: We'd seen the storm brewing when we were out in the boat.
sentences.cn: 我们在外面划船的时候就发现风暴将至。

sentences.en: What are you, fresh off the boat?.
sentences.cn: 你是什么人，初来乍到吧。

sentences.en: When the boat reached Cape Town, we said a temporary goodbye.
sentences.cn: 客轮到达开普敦时，我们暂时分别。

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)在同一条船上，患难与共
处境相同：和另一个人或其他人处境相同
(非正式 常 冒犯)刚从外国来的，从外国初来乍到的，人地生疏的，外来的，不懂异国风俗习惯的，无在异国生活经验的

trans.tran_en: a vehicle that travels across water
a vehicle that travels across water
